key_themes: Institutional de-risking and record cash positioning
Crypto/blockchain infrastructure momentum as risk barometer
Regulatory uncertainty across financial services and digital assets
Valuation extremes vs. anticipated monetary easing
Consumer cost pressures eroding purchasing power
risk_factors: Record market cap-to-GDP ratios (218%) indicating extreme valuations
Regulatory tightening across banking capital requirements and stablecoin frameworks
Geopolitical tensions (Ukraine, Taiwan) creating binary risk events
Earnings guidance deterioration in enterprise software and fintech sectors
Disconnect between retail optimism and institutional defensive positioning
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Call Wall resistance $700 (active hedging), support $680 (active). QQQ: Immediate resistance $620 (max pain gravity), support $590. Watch for price action around max pain levels as year-end expiration mechanics dominate.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Resistance $700 (call wall), $730 (dormant). Support $630 (put wall major), $640 (secondary). QQQ: Resistance $630-640 zone. Support $590 (active), $574.78 (put wall major). Breakdown below active support levels signals institutional de-risking acceleration.
